analysis.description:

	- balance = token.balanceOf(_to) (/unique_chucks/1/0x47dd62d4d075dead71d0e00299fc56a2d747bebb.sol#335-336)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/1/0x47dd62d4d075dead71d0e00299fc56a2d747bebb.sol#336-337)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/1/0x47dd62d4d075dead71d0e00299fc56a2d747bebb.sol#337-338)

EqualToken.redistribute has external calls inside a loop:

	External calls:
	- _totalSupply = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/1/0x47dd62d4d075dead71d0e00299fc56a2d747bebb.sol#322-323)

EqualToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0x47dd62d4d075dead71d0e00299fc56a2d747bebb.sol#296-298)
